page.title: 06HOOK NORTON LEISURE GROUPS
page.content: {The Playgroup} meets at the Playgroup Centre.Members aged 3-5 share play activities.Special events include seasonal entertainments. {The Pear Tree Public House}-facilities include an Aunt Sally pitch and a childrens'garden play area. Special events include performances by Morris Dancers and the Hook Norton Band. {The Sun Inn}- attractions include a skittle alley and a chidrens' garden. {The Red Lion}- pub games available. {The Ramblers Society} meets at the old Wheatsheaf Inn.It aims to keep all footpaths clear for walkers. {The Scouts} meet at the Baptist Hall. Members, boys aged 10-16. Activities include camping, swimming and the St. George's Day parade. {The Spinners, Weavers and Dyers Guild} meet at the Study Centre.The group aims to produce an annual exhibition of work
